ygData.subject: RE: Area Songs in Lguk [WAS:Does CHR affect Largos?
ygData.msgSnippet: At 15th level, my druid couldn t solo a yellow, and was dying to whites in Kithicor (this is before Kithicor became a death trap) Sarah is not good at soloing,
ygData.messageBody:
At 15th level, my druid couldn't solo a yellow, and was dying to whites in
Kithicor (this is before Kithicor became a death trap)

Sarah is not good at soloing, period. So I was thrilled.

Then, of course, I tried again, died, and thus my current signature.

Sarah Heacock sarah@...
Meara, level 13 Enchanter, Master Jeweler, owner Meara's Boutique of
Mystiques, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faerain, level 18 Soldier of Tunare, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faesong, level 8(!) HalfElf Bard of Solusek Ro, Phoenix, Solusek Ro (dying
to giant wasps in Misty Thicket)

>-----Original Message-----
>From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:Dean_Kimes@...]
>Sent: Thursday, February 10, 2000 11:38 AM

>> Did you know a level 7 bard can take out yellow giant wasps solo?
>> Did you know a level 50 bard cannot solo a L34 npc guard? ;-)
>> Harmonic.
>
> A level 7 Druid, Enchanter, Paladin, Wizard, or Mage can also solo
>that same yellow Giant wasp from personal experience. Unlike Druids and
>Enchanters however we cannot solo a yellow even at 15th level.
>
> Kit
